title: Please, Listen to It♪
detail_text: <:th_ch0206/>Kanan-chan, Kanata has a once in a lifetime request for you….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>You look serious…. As long as it’s something I can do, it’s fine….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>This is something that only Kanan-chan can do….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Gulp…. W-, what is it?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>So, Kanata will be taking a nap on top of a rubber boat, then Kanata wants you to pull the boat out to the sea~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>….Eh?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>So, Kanata will be taking a nap on top of a rubber boat….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Ah, I heard what you said, I get it. But is it really something you would use a once in a lifetime request for?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>It is. To Kanata, a nap on top of the beautiful Uchiura sea is a re~ally valuable thing<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Fufu, do you really like this sea that much?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Of course! It’s full of delicious fish, and on top of that, it’s beautiful! There’s no way that anyone wouldn’t love it~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Alright~, then I’ll take you to the sea with all my might!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
